user_story: As a freelancer with variable income, I want flexible account options in the banking system so that I can choose the features that best suit my financial needs.
generated_ac:
1. The system shall display a configurable list of available account features that users can choose from.
2. The system shall allow users to add or remove specific features to their selected account type.
3. The system shall clearly present the costs or benefits associated with each configurable account feature.
4. The system shall enable users to modify their account's chosen features at any point after account creation.

final_ac:
1. The system shall allow the user to select and customize account options based on their financial needs.
2. The system shall ensure stability by handling exceptional cases without crashing or losing data.
3. The system shall display a configurable list of available account features that users can choose from.
4. The system shall allow users to add or remove specific features to their selected account type.
